title: Help Please
body: When i try too open up league it says that patch kernel has stopped working

replies.body:
Hey xLunarPhazex!

Patcher Kernel Errors usually indicate an issue with your Windows permissions on your computer.  There are various steps that can resolve this error, so make sure that you try every single one in the following guide:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues

I know there are quite a few steps here and can be daunting, but work through them one-by-one, which should resolve your issue!  If this error still haunts you daily, feel free to [submit a new ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to our Tech Team!  They can help you further and provide more specific solutions!  If you do submit a ticket, include the following:

1) Network Analysis: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1

2) NetworkInfo Log: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4

3) Process List: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3
